trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for editors that use a modal dialog to display a properties page similar to an ActiveX control's property page.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor"></xref> class.
Creates an editor window that allows the user to edit the specified component, using the specified context information.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component was changed during editing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates an editor window that allows the user to edit the specified component, using the specified window that owns the component.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that the component belongs to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component was changed during editing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates an editor window that allows the user to edit the specified component.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that the component belongs to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component was changed during editing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the component editor pages associated with the component editor.
An array of component editor pages.
Gets the index of the initial component editor page for the component editor to display.
The index of the component editor page that the component editor will initially display.
